Jx.Menu

Extends: Jx.Widget

A main menu as opposed to a sub menu that lives inside the menu.

Summary
Jx.MenuExtends: Jx.Widget
TODO
Jx.Menurevisit this to see if Jx.Menu and Jx.SubMenu can be merged into a single implementation.
Options
exposeOnHover{Boolean} default false, if set to true the menu will show when the mouse hovers over it rather than when it is clicked.
hideDelay{Integer} default 0, if greater than 0, this is the number of milliseconds to delay before hiding a menu when the mouse leaves the menu button or list.
Functions
renderCreate a new instance of Jx.Menu.
addAdd menu items to the sub menu.
removeRemove a menu item from the menu
replaceReplace a menu item with another menu item
emptyEmpty the menu of items
hideHide the menu.
showShow the menu
setVisibleItemSet the sub menu that is currently open
isEnabledThis returns true if the menu is enabled, false otherwise
setEnabledenable or disable the menu.
isActivereturns true if the menu is open.
setActiveSet the active state of the menu
setImageset the image of this menu to a new image URL
setLabelsets the text of the menu.
getLabelreturns the text of the menu.
setTooltipsets the tooltip displayed by the menu
focuscapture the keyboard focus on this menu
blurremove the keyboard focus from this menu

TODO

Jx.Menu

revisit this to see if Jx.Menu and Jx.SubMenu can be merged into a single implementation.

Example

Options



exposeOnHover
{Boolean} default false, if set to true the menu will show when the mouse hovers over it rather than when it is clicked.



hideDelay
{Integer} default 0, if greater than 0, this is the number of milliseconds to delay before hiding a menu when the mouse leaves the menu button or list.



Functions



render
render : function()
Create a new instance of Jx.Menu.



add
add: function(item,
position,
owner)
Add menu items to the sub menu.
Parameters
item{<Jx.MenuItem>} the menu item to add.   Multiple menu items can be added by passing an array of menu items.
positionthe index to add the item at, defaults to the end of the menu



remove
remove: function(item)
Remove a menu item from the menu
Parameters
item{<Jx.MenuItem>} the menu item to remove



replace
replace: function(item,
withItem)
Replace a menu item with another menu item
Parameters
what{<Jx.MenuItem>} the menu item to replace
withWhat{<Jx.MenuItem>} the menu item to replace it with



empty
empty: function()
Empty the menu of items



hide
hide: function(e)
Hide the menu.
Parameters
e{Event} the mouse event



show
show : function()
Show the menu



setVisibleItem
setVisibleItem: function(obj)
Set the sub menu that is currently open
Parameters
obj- {<Jx.SubMenu>} the sub menu that just became visible



isEnabled
isEnabled: function()
This returns true if the menu is enabled, false otherwise
Returns
{Boolean} whether the menu is enabled or not



setEnabled
setEnabled: function(enabled)
enable or disable the menu.
Parameters
enabled{Boolean} the new enabled state of the menu



isActive
isActive: function()
returns true if the menu is open.
Returns
{Boolean} the active state of the menu



setActive
setActive: function(active)
Set the active state of the menu
Parameters
active{Boolean} the new active state of the menu



setImage
setImage: function(path)
set the image of this menu to a new image URL
Parameters
path{String} the new url to use as the image for this menu



setLabel
setLabel: function(label)
sets the text of the menu.
Parameters
label{String} the new label for the menu



getLabel
getLabel: function()
returns the text of the menu.



setTooltip
setTooltip: function(tooltip)
sets the tooltip displayed by the menu
Parameters
tooltip{String} the new tooltip



focus
focus: function()
capture the keyboard focus on this menu



blur
blur: function()
remove the keyboard focus from this menu









Base class for all widgets (visual classes) in the JxLib Framework.

Create a new instance of Jx.Menu.

position,
owner)
